# INReservationStatus.confirmed

**Case**

The reservation is confirmed.

## Declaration

```swift
case confirmed
```

## Reservation Status

- **INReservationStatus.unknown**: The current reservation is unknown.
- **INReservationStatus.canceled**: The user or business canceled the reservation.
- **INReservationStatus.pending**: The reservation confirmation is pending.
- **INReservationStatus.hold**: The reservation is on hold.

items.description: The user or business canceled the reservation.
items.name: INReservationStatus.canceled
